channel.title: Xmpp on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Xmpp on Arrans github.io

item.title: processone/ejabberd
item.description: Robust, Ubiquitous and Massively Scalable Messaging Platform (XMPP, MQTT, SIP Server)

item.title: tinode/chat
item.description: Instant messaging platform. Backend in Go. Clients: Swift iOS, Java Android, JS webapp, scriptable command line; chatbots

item.title: 42wim/matterbridge
item.description: bridge between mattermost, IRC, gitter, xmpp, slack, discord, telegram, rocketchat, twitch, ssh-chat, zulip, whatsapp, keybase, matrix, microsoft teams, nextcloud, mumble, vk and more with REST API (mattermost not required!)
